Address: Dorpstraat 189-E Veldhoven Rental price: €1,123.00 Available from: prognosis May 2024  On Dorpstraat 189 in Veldhoven, 12  soft-furnished rental appartments in the middle rental price category are rising.  The standard features of these brand-new flats include 2 bedrooms, a complete kitchen, a tidy bathroom, painted walls, PVC floor finishing, private storage space and private parking in the rear yard of the complex.  The Dorpstraat in Veldhoven is located a short distance from various amenities. The CityCentrum, hospital, schools, the national road network, sports facilities and shopping facilities are all a few minutes away.  Currently, the construction of the complex is in the completion phase. The flats are expected to be completed around May 2024.  MIDDLE RENT PRICE CATEGORY: Due to an agreement with Veldhoven municipality, these 12 flats are offered in the middle rental price category. This means that, even though the market value of these flats is higher than the median rental price limit, all flats are offered with a fixed initial rental price of € 1123,- excl. service costs per month. This means that tenants benefit from a lower rent than the market rent.  APPOINTMENT FOR VIEWING: Given the current state of construction, an appointmentfor viewing of the apartments is currently not possible.  FLAT LAYOUT DORPSTRAAT 189-E:  General: - Videofoon; - Access to the apartment via communal hall and stairwell (for apartments on the floors via stairwell, there is no elevator)  Flat (first floor):  - Entrance; - Hallway; - Technical room with connection for heat pump, ventilation unit and connection for washing equipment; - Living room with open kitchen equipped with composite worktop and various built-in appliances (Siemens or equivalent) including refrigerator, induction hob, combination oven/microwave, dishwasher and recirculation hood;  - Toilet room fitted with tiling, hanging toilet and hand basin; - Bathroom fitted with walk-in shower with partial shower partition and fixed washbasin; - Storage room with heating system and connections for washer and dryer;  - Bedroom 1; - Bedroom 2; - Balcony; - The flat has a quality floor finish and painted walls; - Private storage room (equipped with electricity) in the back yard; - Private parking space in the rear yard.  FINISHING:  - The flat is heated by underfloor heating; - The flat has a floor finish;  - The walls are delivered including texwerk.  RENTAL CONDITIONS: To qualify for this rental flat, the landlord sets some income requirements. These are as follows: - In case of 1 income, your gross monthly income should be at least 3.5x the rent. Any fixed surcharges such as holiday allowance, year-end bonus, etc. may be included; - In case of two incomes (yours and your partner's), the lowest income may be taken into account for 100%; - If you are employed, you must have at least a fixed-term employment contract (annual contract with letter of intent) or an open-ended contract. On-call, temporary or flex contracts are not included; - If you are retired, the sum of AOW and any net pension must be at least 3 times the rent; - If you are self-employed, self-employed entrepreneur or DGA, you must have a net profit before tax of at least 4 times the rent. You must also be an entrepreneur for at least one full financial year; - If you have benefits and this is a guaranteed/fixed income, this may be added to the combined gross income.   In addition to the income requirements, the rental conditions below apply: - The minimum rental period is 12 months. After that, the rental agreement can be terminated per the first of the following month +1 month; - A security deposit of 2x the rent is standard; - The service costs per month amount to € 96,50. This amount consists of a fixed upholstery fee of € 31,50,- and an advance service charge of € 65,- per month;  - Pets are not allowed.  IMPRESSIONS:  This advertisement has been compiled with care. The impressions and floor plans shown give an impression of the appearance and layout. No rights can be derived from these.The floor plan shown for the relevant flat may be mirrored in this advertisement.

Badkamer (1) Gedeeltelijk betegelde badkamer voorzien van een douchecabine, wastafel, aansluitingen wassen/drogen, mechanische ventilatie en een radiator.  Toilet Geheel betegelde toiletruimte met hangcloset en fonteintje met kastje.  Wasruimte: Aparte kamer voorzien van aansluitingen voor wassen en drogen.  Slaapkamers 3 volwaardige slaapkamers, allen afgewerkt met pvc vloeren, stucwerkwanden en – plafonds, elektra, utp-aansluitingen, voldoende stopcontacten en verlichting. Dakterras Ruim dakterras (ca. 20m²) voorzien van hardhouten vlonders.  2E VERDIEPING:  Middels een vaste trapopgang toegang tot een ruime voorzolder met toegang tot de 2e badkamer en een royale 5e slaapkamer.  Badkamer (2): Modern badkamer voorzien van tegelvloer, inloopdouche, wastafel met bijpassend meubel en een dakraam.  Slaapkamer 5: Royale 5e slaapkamer met pvc vloer, 4 dakramen, verlichting, voldoende stopcontacten, airco, bergruimte en een aparte kast met de opstelling van de cv-combi ketel (2024)  Berging: Separaat gelegen berging van ca. 12m² voorzien van elektra en een radiator.
